titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require that burials be permitted in national cemeteries on weekends and holidays.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to prescribe the necessary regulations to ensure that burials in national cemeteries be permitted on weekends and holidays.
